name: Gulpin

evolution.description: Gulpin can evolve into Swalot at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Stomach Pokémon. Most of Gulpin's body is made up of its stomach-its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon's stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.description: If an enemy uses a leeching or absorb move against this Pokémon, the Pokémon must make a DC 12 CON save or become poisoned.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Held items cannot be stolen or knocked away from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.
